trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANKJN402_02986_SEQ_00<tab>Zukin is exploring a new avenue of business with the Namazu.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANKJN402_02986_TODO_00<tab>Slay a spry gyuki and collect a cut of gyuki meat.
TEXT_BANKJN402_02986_ZUKIN_000_000<tab>In our dealings with the Namazu, we have discovered that one of their favorite foods is the meat of the fearsome gyuki.

TEXT_BANKJN402_02986_ZUKIN_000_001<tab>However, the Namazu struggle to acquire said meat by themselves. Shrewd in business they may be, but adept hunters they are not. Might I call upon your services once more?
TEXT_BANKJN402_02986_ZUKIN_000_021<tab>Kami have mercy! If size and stench are the measures by which Namazu judge their meat, I would say they will be more than satisfied.
TEXT_BANKJN402_02986_ZUKIN_000_022<tab>Man and Kojin alike tend to be repulsed by such pungent, sinewy fodder, but the Namazu have no such aversions.

TEXT_BANKJN402_02986_ZUKIN_000_023<tab>Trade in this otherwise worthless meat will help forge stronger ties with the Namazu and provide much-needed capital. Perhaps we can rely on your gyuki-slaying skills in the future?
